com.here.android.mpa.ar

Class ARController.DownViewParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARController.DownViewParams
  • Enclosing class:
    ARController

    public final class ARController.DownViewParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates parameters which affect the Down view.

      • setAutoZoomEnabled

        public ARController.DownViewParams setAutoZoomEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable/disable auto zoom control. When true ARController adjusts the zoom level automatically
        Parameters:
        autoZoom - If true, zoom is adjusted automatically
